CustomField.description: If checked, referenced images will be deep embedded (saved with) the document. Otherwise, images are linked to. Embedded images requires a user to click 'Yes' when initially opening the document.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If checked, referenced images will be deep embedded (saved with) the document. Otherwise, images are linked to. Embedded images requires a user to click 'Yes' when initially opening the document.
CustomField.label: MS Embed Images
